115111211.content:
One day, during one of the KND operations, numbah 3 got hit by a weird ray from one of the bad guys. She shook it off for the moment, assuming it was just a knock back gun to keep them away. Eventually they won, and they went back to their treehouse.

Later that evening, as she is watching rainbow monkeys on tv, she started to feel weird. "Eh, must be nothing," she thought to herself. What she didn't notice was that her breasts were getting bigger. After some time, her show finishes and she gets up from the couch. While standing up, she feels a weird weight on her chest that wasn't there before. She looked down, and to her surprise, she could see bulges in what used to be her loose sweater. "What the..." she thinks, as she peers down the neck hole to see that her 10 year old breasts had grown to DD's. to her surprise, her breasts were swelling still.

1152111.content:
Daphne from A Pup Named Scooby-Doo

Last weekend was the incident in "A Babysitter From Beyond," and Daphne was putting on perfume in her personal perfume room. Unfortunately though, her parents just electronically sent some poor news.

Daphne,

This is your loving parents and we love you ow so much that we had to something for your benefit. We've hired a babysitter for you this break week, because we're worried about your safety. We've heard that kids your age aren't responsible enough to stay home alone and your mishap last weekend proved this right. Don't worry, Ms. Youth is very kind and we've has Mr. Johnson inform your friends that you will be unavailable. Please take this well. Love Mom and Dad!''

Daphne started to panic, what was she gonna do?! She can't contact her friends, she doesn't want to argue with her parents, but she can't stand the idea of being babysat. 'I'm mature enough!' she thought, then she heard a knock on the perfume door. Daphne snapped out of her panic, made a quick sigh, and put on the happy face.

Ms. Youth knocked again, before Daphne came to the door and asked, in a very motherly tone "Daphne, sweetie, its Ms. Smith, just wondering if I can check in with you."

Daphne opened the door, before a third knock and quickly greeted Ms. Youth in a tone that was obviously fake. "Hi.. Ms. Smith, yes my name is Daphne, nice to meet you!"

Ms. Youth chuckled. "You don't have to hide your disappointment dear. I understand the shock your likely going through, but I want you to know I will turn that frown upside down. That's my policy!

Daphne was surprised by Ms. Youth catching on so easily, "Um, yeah... I have to ask though? Why'd you agree to babysit me anyways? My parents might be crazy, thinking I need one, but why would someone like you agree?"

Ms. Youth smiled and gave a warm answer. "Because I love taking care of kids your age, your so much more enjoyable and adorable, full of that kid cheer." At this point she was babying Daphne big time, talking down to her and squeezing her cheeks. "Besides, I was the one who recommend you have a babysitter."

Daphne was really annoyed hearing that and took off the facade, removing her pleasant tone and freeing her cheek. "Why on earth do you think you have the right to babysit me and manipulate my parents?!"

Ms. Youth's belittling took full force, "Ahhhh, isn't the little girly cute when she's maddie waddie. Well, I just don't think your fit to be alone. Girls your age need lots of love, because of your self-destructive egos."

Daphne was furious after hearing this, "STOP TREATING ME LIKE A BABY! I am a KID. I'm going to my room, where I don't have to see your face."

Ms. Youth followed Daphne, saying "Great idea, now you can see the changes I've made to it. We can situate you better that way."

Daphne then rushed to her room only to find it completely RE-DONE baby style. At the end, the whole room was now a delicate shade of pinks. Daphne's bed was a pink and red crib, and baby toys hung above it. This had planets attached to it, as well as the sun. Nearby was a fully-stocked, red and pink starred changing table, with fluffy white disposable diapers neatly stacked on top. Of course there was baby powder and other products, such as lotions, oils, creams, and other supplies. On the floor of the nursery there was a rocking horse, an activity chair, and a baby swing as well as an assorted profusion stuffed animals and other baby toys scattered amid the carpet. Some of these toys included soft-sculptured plastic building blocks, colorful rattles, rainbow donut-shaped rings that were wrapped around a yellow peg, cuddly plush toys, glossy child-proofed picture books with rounded corners and thick pages, jack-in-the-boxes, and even a pair of plastic toy keys.

Nearby, there was a shelf filled with many bedtime stories, with a pink cushy chair to the side. There was even was a pink stroller and baby carrier in the corner of the room next to a closet, with a large, light pink diaper bag filled with travelling supplies, such as warmed bottles of baby formula, small animal plushies, and several pacifiers. Near the closet was a tiny fridge, containing baby food and milk inside. Lastly, the carpeted floor was now a light pink and very soft, for a baby to walk on.

Daphne didn't know what to say, but tried to mutter disapproval. "Yo-yo-you gotta be kidding me."

Ms. Youth replied, "Ahh, you are soo cute. Many girls have a big shock, when they realize they;re not done with diapers. So, come on and strip naked, so I can diaper that adorable butt of yours."

Daphne had enough at this point and surprisingly started jumping up and down in what seemed to be a temper tantrum. "NO! NO! NO! I AM NOT A BABY! I DON"T NEED DIAPERS! I WANT MY OLD ROOM BACK!"

Ms. Youth stopped her by manipulation. She said "Ok." and Daphne stopped more calm, as she again got exactly what she wanted. (Much of her childhood was this actually and the girl didn't know rejection) Then Ms. Youth pulled something her side, and what was it?! A PACIFIER!

The pacifier was bright pink and it landed perfectly in Daphne's mouth, with her being completely confused. Daphne tried hard to take out the pacifier, but her mouth didn't want to let go for some reason and even worse there was some sort of drug on the pacifier. The drug caused her lose control of her body movement, and she already couldn't talk. She stood there in her typical pink clothes with a pacifier in her mouth; so still she could fall to the ground at any moment.

She still was able to move facial features, showing she was in a panic as tears ran down her face. She didn't want to wear baby GARB!

Ms. Youth went behind her, and tripped Daphne, causing Daphne's back to fall perfectly into Youth's arms. Ms. Youth smiled down at Daphne, as she took Daphne to the changing table. After gently placing Daphne on the cushion-y table, Ms. Youth giggled, "Ahhh, what an adorable baby girl!"

Ms. Youth then removed Daphne's skirt and panties, in one go. This left Daphne very uncomfortable, but there was nothing she could do at this point. Then Ms. Youth raised Daphne's legs and proceed in a full diaper changing. She powdered Daphne with a nice big tap to the baby powder and then gently lowered Daphne's legs. Only thing remaining was strapping the diaper in place; Ms. Youth slowly but firmly finalized the changing.

This is when something strange happened. Daphne surrendered her will to Ms. Youth, starting to enjoy the pacifier and diaper feeling. Once this happened, Daphne noticed her body start to shrink, shrink a the way down to infancy. Her clothes strangely shrunk with it. The change was a sudden physical change, but Daphne's mind remained intact. Daphne started to tear up and soon cry, finally losing the grip of the pacifier. "WAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAHHH!!"

Ms. Youth had a very calm motherly response, as usual. She picked up little Daphne and cradled her with endless love. "Its ok baby, your all safe." This strangely soothed Daphne. As a baby, certain motherly responses now triggered baby responses even if Daphne didn't want it. "So, lets finish this changing shall we?" Youth then opened up a drawer to find a similar pink skirt from earlier. Except, this pink skirt was baby size. Ms. Youth gently put this skirt on Daphne. The skirt took up less than half of the diaper, allowing bystanders to easily notice Daphne's diaper from a mile a away.

Daphne then, almost instinctively sat up and started sucking her thumb. Daphne stared at Ms. Youth with a happy glance. She figured, might as well make the best out of this.
1152111.title: Babysitter Troubles, Making Daphne a Baby

Timmy's mom was cleaning the house as usual, and something strange happened when she went into Timmy's room. She started setting Timmy's bed, when she felt something behind her. She turned around and, and... it was a floating baby! Poof was right behind her, unusually unparented at the moment.

Timmy's mom screeched in fear, "WHO ARE YOU?! WHAT ARE YOU?!"

Poof just laughed in the air and then started to say a couple sentences, but it only came out as baby speech.

Timmy's mom was just frustrated at this point. "I wish I could understand you!"

Poof laughed again this time revealing a wand, which frightened Timmy's mom. Poof came over to her, and booped her nose with the wand, turning her into a 1 year old.

Timmy's mom was now wearing just two things, a small baby lavender shirt and a white fluffy diaper. She fell to the ground straight on her butt and suddenly started to cry like a baby.

"WAAHHHHHHHHHH"

Poof just smiled and poofed a pink pacifer in her mouth.

Poof actually then poofed Timmy's room, giving it an additional crib, changing table with baby supplies, and baby toys that covered the floor. Poof and her played until Timmy came home.

Timmy entered his house, saying out loud "MOM, I"M HOME!" He got no reply though. "Hmm.. thats odd. Maybe she's in her room." While he was going upstairs, he heard a bunch of noise coming from his room, so he decided to look in and... was horrified.

Meanwhile, Keswick had just finished a prototype chemical and was about to show give everyone. As he made his way to the offices, Dudley was about to mark Kitty.

1241.title: Tommy Pickles

124111.content:
Kimi and Tommy were going on their first date, but Kimi had a secret plan up her sleeve; Make this babysitting instead.

The two were spending a weekend at Kimi's house. No parents or siblings, just the two of them. After Tommy put his stuff down in the guest room, he came to the main room. "So, whatcha wanna do?"

Kimi smiled adorably, "Well, we could.. watch old home footage. Film is sorta your thing."

"Yeah, that sounds um.. cool."

The two were watching old footage of the gang and making funny remarks about what they used to do.

Tommy attempted to put his arm around Kimi at one point, but Kimi noticed. Her remark was odd and Tommy didn't quite know how to respond.

Kimi said in a condescending motherly voice "Awww, Tommy, your trying to put your arm around me? How sweet."

"Right.."

"Ooooo... I have an idea" Kimi raised. "So, you know how we both look so cute in these films?"

"Yea..."

"Well, why don't we take turns role playing as our young selves."

"Uh, sure."

"Kk, how about you go first? Follow me."

Tommy was getting nervous. He had never seen this side of Kimi before. She walked him into her room, which strangely had a crib, a changing table, diapers, anf stuffed animals on one side. The other side had Kimi's bed and all of her belongings. It was as if the room was split in half. Tommy raised his voice a little though, "Um Kimi, why don't we just do me role playing. I don't want you to have to."

"Alright then if you want that. This means more time for you of course."

She started going for his pants just then, saying "I'll help you." She was so fast Tommy didn't have time to interject. Before he knew it, his pants were slipped down. He couldn't help but blush. Then Kimi told him "One sec, Ill take off your shoes and socks." This made it possible to remove the pants. In almost one motion, she removed the pants. She then removed his shirt, making him almost naked. Then she warmly said, "We're almost done done. A little someone just needs his diapy changed."

She picked him gently, holding him as if he was a baby. Her strength was unbelievable, but she picked up the kid like it were nothing. Then in a loving voice she said "Rock a bye baby under the treetop, if he cries the cradle will drop." She kissed his forehead and then said. "Soon, you'll be changed little one."

She gently lowered him on the changing table and removed his last article of clothing. Once it was off and Tommy was completely naked, Kimi giggled. "What an adorable baby you are." She then wiped his butt, applied baby powder and put on a diaper, which surprisingly fit. To top it off she put on a blue shirt similar to his baby one. Within an instant of wearing the diaper and shirt, Tommy regressed with them to the tender age of 1. He looked like he did in the hold family photos and Kimi was overwhelmed with glee.

"AWWWWWWWW, I knew you would look adorable and you do. I would much rather be babysitting you Tommy than dating you. He started to cry and Kimi said "Oh, there there. Does baby want his bottle?" She held him like a baby again, just now it felt natural. Not too slow or fast she fed him warm milk from a bottle. "Don't you cry little one. Big Kimi is here."
124111.title: A baby.. duh

info.brief_description: Inflate shrink grow etc any of your favorite cartoon characters
info.description:
In this story you can inflate by body/belly/breasts/butt as well as change a character's gender/size/age or making them pregnant
You will start off choosing a station.

please:
No hardcore material please: gay/lesbian, erotica, etc.
No cursing
No Vore
No male characters TF unless turned into a girl
No killing off or making a character no longer existing
No popping unless the character returns to normal
No ending the story quickly, try to have at least fifteen chapters(not including tf options) before ending the story and have the secondary option of keeping the story going
please try to add as much detail to the transformation as possible


I'VE EDITED OUT A FEW SHOWS AS WELL ADDED SOME NEW ONES AND CHANGED SOME RULES..
